arts.ttl: Milan target Vlahovic scores for Juventus in win vs Parma
arts.sum: He starts on the bench, gets whistled at, scores, and celebrates staring straight at the Curva. In just a few snapshots, that was Dusan Vlahovic’s evening in the match that opened Juventus’ league campaign. In Turin, the Bianconeri beat Parma 2-0: the first half ended goalless, then Jonathan David broke the deadlock after the restart. […]

arts.ttl: Juventus vs. Parma: an opening-day classic
arts.sum: Juventus and Parma are set to meet on the opening matchday for the first time since 2019/20. Juventus-Parma returns to the opening matchday: the Bianconeri have always won in the four previous occasions.

arts.ttl: Juventus vs Parma – Predicted Lineup and Team News
arts.sum: Juventus face a home clash against Parma at the Allianz Stadium on the opening weekend of the Serie A season. Both teams return to competitive action after mixed pre-season results, with fans eager to see new signings and tactical tweaks. Juventus vs Parma – Predicted Lineups and Team News Juventus Team News Manager Igor Tudor […] The post Juventus vs Parma – Predicted Lineup and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

The new Serie A campaign gets underway on Saturday, as the league returns following an incredible finish to last season, and Aaron Rogan has predictions for all 10 games.

Napoli begin their title defence without the injured Romelu Lukaku, who might not return in 2025. They play newly-promoted Sassuolo. Meanwhile, Milan take on Cremonese and Roma face Bologna.
